dcterms:description: The official training dataset for the SemEval 2019 Task 5, containing 9000 tweets for training, 1000 for development, and 2971 for testing, with labels indicating hate speech, aggressive behavior, and target classification.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2019 Task 5
